entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
